member.name: D3D12_DXIL_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION
member.summary: This subobject is unsupported in the current release.

member.name: D3D12_DXIL_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION.NumExports
member.summary: Size of the pExports array. If 0, this is being explicitly defined as a default association. Another way to define a default association is to omit this subobject association for that subobject completely.

member.name: D3D12_DXIL_SUBOBJECT_TO_EXPORTS_ASSOCIATION.pExports
member.summary: The array of exports with which the subobject is associated.
